history.message:
Hi Janis Butler,

Thank you for your interest in The Decadent Review. We have received your submission and look forward to reviewing it.

Thanks!
-The Decadent Review

Dear Janis,

How lovely, these could go well in our Christmas issue. I'll contact you by email with a draft.


Thank you,

D.

Dear Janis Butler Holm,

Congratulations! This message confirms the acceptance of your submission to The Decadent Review.

Thanks again.
Sincerely,
Dimitri Kaufman
The Decadent Review
